definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: The Jiegou coalmine is situated at southern Huaibei coalfield, designed capacity is 0.
sentences.chinese: 界沟煤矿位于淮北煤田南部，设计生产能力为0。

sentences.english: In conclusion, photoperiod is an effective method to improve dairy goat production.
sentences.chinese: 综合上述，延长光照可有效增进乳羊产能。

sentences.english: We have 800-ton heat treatment capability per month.
sentences.chinese: 生产手段齐全能量大，生产能力每月可达800吨。

sentences.english: If no overcapacity, it is clear that it is disgreeing with MIIT.
sentences.chinese: 如果说产能不过剩，摆明了是跟工信部唱反调。

sentences.english: In order to content the productive capacity of soda, a new calciner system was added.
sentences.chinese: 为满足纯碱生产能力，新增一套煅烧炉系统。

sentences.english: The company's advanced cold-chain logistics system will support the expanding capacity.
sentences.chinese: 该公司先进的冷链物流系统将支持扩大生产能力。

sentences.english: Encourage current suppliers to expand investment and capacity in TJ area.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励现有供应商在天津扩大投资，增加产能。

sentences.english: Our company specializes in the R&D and manufacturing of lighting products.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一所拥有开发与生产能力的外销灯具厂。

sentences.english: Why should they pump loans into capacity expansion?
sentences.chinese: 他们为什么还会用贷款来扩大产能？

sentences.english: Malfunctions constitute the major factors affecting the productivity of automatic reeling machines.
sentences.chinese: 丝故障是影响自动缫生产能力的主要因素。

sentences.english: Through upwards research , develop interpretation and off-take potential forecasting software.
sentences.chinese: 通过以上研究，研制了资料解释软件及产能预测软件。

sentences.english: Tongyi has three lube oil blending plants in China with a total annual capacity of 600,000 tons.
sentences.chinese: 统一在中国有三家润滑油调配厂，年产能达60万吨。

sentences.english: A high level of steel casting production capacity.
sentences.chinese: 高水平的铸钢件生产能力。

sentences.english: China's own automakers are also revving up production.
sentences.chinese: 中国本土的汽车制造商也在开足马力提高产能。

sentences.english: The Volkswagen Group is expanding its production capacities in China.
sentences.chinese: 德国大众汽车集团将在中国扩大产能。

sentences.english: This paper expounds the causes of the rapid extension of the production capacity of aluminum ingot in China.
sentences.chinese: 文章阐述了我国铝锭产能迅速扩充的原因。

definition: to put into production/to put into operation
to change production/to move over to new products
property or cash held in reserve/stock
market share/abbr. for 市場佔有率|市场占有率
